data/events_boons.xml$/FTL/event[@name=\: From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Humanity. Your Human crew will gain a... 20% resistance to hazards. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Greater Boon... of Humanity. Your Human crew will gain a... 20% resistance to hazards, and a... 10% boost to their damage, repair, health, and movement. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Nanites. Your Engi crew will gain a... 20% boost to repair speed. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Hardlight. Your Zoltan crew will gain... 15 more health. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Vegetation. Your Orchid crew will heal allied crew at... 0.5hp/s while in the... same room. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Insectoids. Your Mantis crew gain... 20% extra ranged damage. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Greater Boon... of Insectoids. Your Mantis crew gain... 25% extra damage. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."
From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Silicon. Your Rock crew put out fires... 30% faster. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Greater Boon... of Silicon. Your Rock crew put out fires... 30% faster and move... 25% faster. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."
From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Geodes. Your Crystal crew gain... 20% more damage. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Slime. Your Slug crew will gain a... 20% resistance to hazards. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Greater Boon... of Slime. Your Slug crew will gain a... 20% resistance to hazards and doubled movement speed. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Shells. Your Shell crew will gain... 15% more resistance to combat damage. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Parasites. Your Leech crew will gain... 10 more health. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Phantoms. Your Ghost crew will gain... 30% more movement speed. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Metalloids. Your Lanius crew will... heal twice as fast and take... 10% less damage from combat. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Shapeshifting. Your Morph crew gain... 10% more health and... 30% more movement speed. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Scales. Your Lizard crew gain a... 15% boost to all standard stats. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Arachnids. Your Spider crew are... controllable even in the absence of the queen. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Equinoids. Perhaps you may use... a new 'ally'? Do not... look it in the mouth. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Ancients. Your Obelisk and Cognitive crew gain... 20 more health and a 15% boost to... damage and repair speed. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Companions. Your Unique crew lose no... skills when cloned... heal 50% faster... and gain a 15% boost to their... damage, repair speed, and movement speed. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "The Boon... of Mechanics. Your crew drones gain... 50 health and... doubled movement speed. You may... thank the previous challenger. Or maybe you... do not? Who can say..."
From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you, visibly annoyed. "The Boon... of Children. Your crew gain a... 1% boost to their health. Please do not... thank the previous challenger."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Weaponry] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: repairs to Weapon system 50% faster. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Shielding] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: repairs to Shields system 50% faster. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Engines] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: repairs to Engines system 50% faster. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Healing] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: 75% faster healing for all crew anywhere. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Cloning] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: skills are not lost from cloning. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Life Support] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: 33% resistance to suffocation. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Teleporting] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: 1hp/s healing to crew in Teleporter room. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Manipulation] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: 60% stun immunity to crew on your own ship. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Hacking] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: crew ignore hacked and locked doors on your ship. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Stealth] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: hull and systems have 10% chance to resist d-d-d-damage. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Temporality] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: YOU SHOULD NEVER SEE THIS. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Drones] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: repairs to Drone Control system 75% faster. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."
From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Sensors] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: maximum sensors. Maximum sensors! But f-f-first let me make [sure] you have them!"
"It seems you -do- not! A-a-a-allow me to remedy [this]. Remedy this!"
"Now, just a m-m-m-m-moment! Moment! If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."
"Wonderful, you do! Just a m-m-m-m-moment! Moment! If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Doors] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: 30% damage resistance to crew in the Doors room, and 50% slowed sabotage to your doors. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Piloting] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: immunity to mind control in the Piloting room. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Battery] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: when Backup Battery is disabled, your crew and drones gain 33% repair and movement speed. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "Grant of [Power] i-i-installed. Installed! Grant provides: one bonus reactor. If -you- witness p-p-previous challenger; provide thanks. I advise you -visit- me as well."

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF BEGINNINGS! Take this gift, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF KERNELS! You will have a 7% chance to ignore the cost of missile weapons, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF CRYSTALS! You will have a 15% chance to break off a crystal shard each time you take damage, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF TRAPS! I shall see to it the fleet is slowed, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF GENERATIONS! All crew you gain from now on will start at lvl 1 in all skills, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF AETHER! Precursor ruins shall now display on your map whenever present, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF MERCHANTS! The traveling merchant will now give you multiple selections of trades, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF SPECIALITY! Your weapons will now charge 5% faster, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF TRANSPORTS! Enemy FTL Drives charge at half speed, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF MATHEMATICS! For each crew member you have in a single room, they will each gain a 4% boost to their health and repair speed, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF RENEGADES! You may avoid fighting any Renegade for free, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF TASKS! The insipid C.U.R.A. will not charge you for running its tasks, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF MORALITY! Your general notoriety will start at negative 3, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF MODULARITY! Take this free module, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"

From nowhere, you hear a voice speaking to you. "CHALLENGER! For you, I grant the BLESSING OF SUPER WEAPONS! Your weapons will charge 10% faster, and may your travels be BLESSED! For whom do you thank? Why, the PREVIOUS CHALLENGER! Hahah!"
